title: Uno
description: Struggling public defender Jimmy McGill constructs an elaborate yet questionable plan for winning back a pair of wealthy potential clients.

title: Mijo
description: Jimmy's latest scam has gone horribly wrong and he's face-to-face with violent criminals and being forced to talk his way out of a life-threatening situation.

title: Nacho
description: Jimmy must prove that Nacho is innocent when he is wrongly suspected of kidnapping.

title: Hero
description: Jimmy makes a bold move against Hamlin in an effort to attract potential clients.

title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
description: After a strange encounter with the police, Chuck ends up in the hospital. Jimmy meets up with a series of unruly clients.

title: Five-O
description: Mike's days as a police officer in Philadelphia catch up to him when he's questioned about a tragic event from his past.

title: Bingo
description: The Kettlemans seek Jimmy as their lawyer after turning down an offer from HHM, going as far as attempting to blackmail him.

title: RICO
description: Jimmy discovers the Sandpiper Retirement Home has been scamming his elderly clients, and prepares to take legal action.

title: Pimento
description: Chuck wants to transfer the Sandpiper case to HHM much to Jimmy's dismay. Mike gets a job offer working as a bodyguard.

title: Marco
description: Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend; Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

title: Switch
description: Jimmy decides to quit the law after turning down a job at Davis & Main. Mike breaks ties with a former associate.

title: Cobbler
description: While Mike attempts to track down Pryce's stolen baseball cards, Jimmy must defend him when the police call him in for further questioning.

title: Amarillo
description: Jimmy struggles with client outreach and decides to shoot a TV commercial for Davis & Main. Mike begins an investigation.

title: Gloves Off
description: Jimmy and Kim face the repercussions of the TV commercial. Mike makes a deal with Nacho in regards to his newest job offer.

title: Rebecca
description: Jimmy chafes under his restrictive work environment; Kim goes to extremes to dig herself from a bottomless hole at HHM.

title: Bali Ha'i
description: Jimmy finds comfort in familiarity; Kim receives a life-changing proposal; when he is threatened, Mike finds himself pushed to the limit.

title: Inflatable
description: When Mike's hand is forced, he can no longer hide his frustration; Mike and Jimmy work together to keep the peace.

title: Fifi
description: Mike aims to settle the score with an enemy; an unexpected opportunity presents itself to Jimmy.

title: Nailed
description: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission; someone questions Chuck's capabilities; Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.

title: Klick
description: Jimmy must make a hard choice; Mike takes control of matters; Hamlin delivers shocking news.

title: Mabel
description: As Chuck plots his next move, another lie comes back to haunt Jimmy. A rattled Mike tries to find out who's been tracking his movements - and how.

title: Witness
description: Jimmy and Kim hire an assistant; Mike seeks out a mysterious acquaintance; and Chuck uses the law to gain an advantage over Jimmy.

title: Sunk Costs
description: Jimmy decides to represent a new client, much to Kim's dismay. Meanwhile, Mike meets a formidable ally who presents him an enticing offer.

title: Sabrosito
description: Jimmy calls in a favor from Mike. Meanwhile, new complications disrupt the Salamancas' business; and Chuck and Jimmy struggle to compromise.

title: Chicanery
description: Kim and Jimmy face off with an adversary. Jimmy looks to Chuck's past to secure his future. Jimmy loses an ally and gains another.

title: Off Brand
description: Jimmy embarks on a new endeavor. Chuck pushes himself to the limit. Nacho finds himself ensnared in a power struggle.

title: Expenses
description: Jimmy tries to settle his debts. Nacho reunites with an old acquaintance. Mike helps Stacey with a project and makes a meaningful connection.

title: Slip
description: Jimmy is pushed to desperate measures. Nacho picks up a skill and Mike explores an alliance. Kim stands up to Hamlin.

title: Fall
description: Jimmy visits an old friend and takes up a new pastime; Chuck and Hamlin spar over the future of the firm; and Kim faces challenges at work.

title: Lantern
description: Kim resolves to take some time off from work, while Jimmy does his best to make amends; Nacho takes a major gamble with his future; Hamlin applies pressure on Chuck to finally make a decision.

title: Smoke
description: Jimmy struggles to cope with Chuck's tragic incidence. Mike ponders his role at Madrigal. Howard makes a startling confession.

title: Breathe
description: Jimmy seeks new employment. Gus navigates the fallout from Hector's collapse. Kim endeavors to support Jimmy in the wake of Chuck's death.

title: Something Beautiful
description: Jimmy puts a risky plan into motion; as alliances shift, Nacho finds himself in the crosshairs; Kim contemplates her future.

title: Talk
description: A restless Jimmy embarks on a new endeavor while Mike burns bridges; Kim pursues her bliss; Nacho tries to survive a turf war.

title: Quite a Ride
description: Jimmy identifies a new market for his talents; Mike vets a potential partnership; Kim drives a hard bargain.

title: Pi√±ata
description: While Jimmy daydreams about reconstituting Wexler-McGill, Kim sets out to secure her own future; Mike puts a plan into motion for Gus.

title: Something Stupid
description: Jimmy runs into a problem as he expands his business that only Kim can solve. Gus gets involved in Hector's medical care. Mike has to deal with a setback.

title: Coushatta
description: Jimmy goes to great lengths to right a wrong, as Kim pulls out all the stops for a case; Mike lets his team blow off steam; Nacho receives a visitor.

title: Wiedersehen
description: Jimmy and Kim unburden themselves, risking their relationship in the process; Nacho is forced to make the rounds with Lalo; Mike has cause to worry.

title: Winner
description: Jimmy turns the page on his reputation; Lalo tracks a loose end in Gus's operation; Mike is forced to make a difficult decision.

title: Magic Man
description: Now doing business as Saul Goodman, Jimmy unveils an unorthodox strategy that tests Kim's tolerance of his new legal persona. Lalo searches for the mysterious "Michael."

title: 50% Off
description: Jimmy's promotional stunt has unintended consequences. Nacho takes extreme measures to earn Lalo's trust. Saul is a success at the courthouse, but still has yet to win Kim over. Simmering with rage and self-loathing, Mike loses his temper.

title: The Guy for This
description: Jimmy's business enters uncharted territory. Kim's confidence is tested when she's faced with a legal problem only she can solve. Nacho navigates increased pressure from Gus. Mike continues to spiral.

title: Namaste
description: As Jimmy doubles down on "Saul Goodman", a deeply conflicted Kim brings him an interesting proposition. Gus makes a sacrifice in order to play the long game. Mike attempts to smooth things over with his family.

title: Dedicado a Max
description: Mike takes an impromptu trip out of town; as she and Jimmy grow closer over their campaign to help a client, Kim makes a surprising call.

title: Wexler v. Goodman
description: Kim tries to pump the brakes on Jimmy's latest scheme, but it may be too late to stop Saul; Mike turns the heat up on Lalo; Nacho attempts to enlist support from above.

title: JMM
description: Jimmy and Kim build a legal firewall with help from Huell; Kim sets things straight with her clients as Jimmy is compromised by his; Gus calms troubled waters in service of his plot to build an empire; Mike does damage control.

title: Bagman
description: When a simple errand for a client goes sideways, Jimmy is pushed to the limit; Mike takes measures to contain the wrath of the cartel; Lalo gets an unexpected visitor.

title: Bad Choice Road
description: In the wake of Jimmy's traumatic misadventure, Kim takes stock of what is important; Jimmy attempts to return to business as usual, but it's more difficult than anticipated; Gus and Mike set a plan in motion.

title: Something Unforgivable
description: Jimmy and Kim make a sideways move that takes a serious turn; Nacho gets closer to the cartel than he'd like.
